title: Paragit Likhit Huajai
overview: Techat is a good looking and good-hearted guy. He works for a charity fund where he bumps into and falls for super star Chanwi. On the other hand, Chanwi has a crush on Bawin, who's also a star of the same entertainment company. A car accident changed their fates, however. With the grim reaper's help, Chanwi does not enter the reincarnation cycle. Techat is the only one who can see her spiritand hence accompanies her to investigate into her death. That's how their love begins, but what should they do next with that love?
